text: Pusan National University Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Pusan National University, located in Pusan, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the larger schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 120 students. == Programs== == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Suwon Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:부산대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Pusan National University School of Law
